settings.heading: FOUNDED BY A MUM OF TWO.

settings.text: “After my breastfeeding experience with both of my boys, I was frustrated with the options on the market. I wanted to create a comfortable, convenient and chic nursing option that you could wear anytime -anywhere, plus continue to have in your wardrobe long after your breastfeeding journey finished.”

MUMMA MILLA bralettes have also been designed to be simple and modern so they can be worn with everything and ensure they have longevity in our wardrobes. 

A considered product designed by a mum, for all those other breastfeeding mothers out there.

I hope this collection makes life a little more comfortable and easy for you!


Jenna.
Founder MUMMA MILLA 

x

settings.right_text:
Venturing down the breastfeeding journey with both of my baby boys, paired with the frustration of going through copious amount of disposable nursing pads, I pined for a simple, comfortable (and attractive) nursing bra that could also catch unexpected leaks at the same time!

After 3 years of research and development, MUMMA MILLA was born. 

I wanted to create a product with a minimal, feminine aesthetic but also ticked the boxes of being functional, comfortable and giving the environment a helping hand.

They say one year of breastfeeding equates to an estimate of 1800 hours, so it was imperative for the product to be comfortable, but also to have many uses from lounging at home with our newborns to heading out for a late lunch, sans disposable nursing pads!
